export_id.description: The identifier of the Export to retrieve.

$block: Exports are batch summaries of your Increase data. You can make them from the API or dashboard. Since they can take a while, they are generated asynchronously. We send a webhook when they are ready. For more information, please read our [Exports documentation](https://increase.com/documentation/exports).

$ul: **category**: The category of the Export. We may add additional possible values for this enum over time; your application should be able to handle that gracefully.
**created_at**: The time the Export was created.
**file_download_url**: A URL at which the Export's file can be downloaded. This will be present when the Export's status transitions to `complete`.
**file_id**: The File containing the contents of the Export. This will be present when the Export's status transitions to `complete`.
**type**: A constant representing the object's type. For this resource it will always be `export`.
